languages.text: {n}Он поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Слушай... Прости меня. Знаю, я и раньше приносил извинения, но сейчас все по-другому. Тогда мне было стыдно и гадко — что лгал, что обидел, — мне хотелось, чтобы ты меня наказал{mf||а}. А сейчас мне просто жаль и очень грустно, что я все это сделал".

{n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."
languages.original_text: {n}Он поворачивается к вам.{/n} "Слушай... Прости меня. Знаю, я и раньше приносил извинения, но сейчас все по-другому. Тогда мне было стыдно и гадко — что лгал, что обидел, — мне хотелось, чтобы ты меня наказал{mf||а}. А сейчас мне просто жаль и очень грустно, что я все это сделал".

{n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

{n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

{n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

languages.text: {n}彼はあなたの方へ向き直った。{/n}「その…すみませんでした。以前も謝りましたが、今回は違うんです。前の時は、自分が恥ずかしくて、自己嫌悪でいっぱいでした。あなたに嘘をついて、傷つけたことに対して、罰してほしかったんです。ですが今はただ、あんなことをしてしまったことが本当に悲しくて、申し訳ないと思っています」
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼はあなたの方へ向き直った。{/n}「その…すみませんでした。以前も謝りましたが、今回は違うんです。前の時は、自分が恥ずかしくて、自己嫌悪でいっぱいでした。あなたに嘘をついて、傷つけたことに対して、罰してほしかったんです。ですが今はただ、あんなことをしてしまったことが本当に悲しくて、申し訳ないと思っています」

languages.text: {n}Er wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Hört zu ... Es tut mir leid. Ich weiß, ich habe mich schon früher entschuldigt, aber diesmal ist es anders. Zuvor war ich beschämt und von mir selbst abgestoßen – weil ich Euch belogen und wehgetan habe – ich wollte, dass Ihr mich bestraft. Aber jetzt tut es mir leid und macht mich sehr traurig, dass ich all das getan habe."
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er wendet sich dir zu.{/n} "Hört zu ... Es tut mir leid. Ich weiß, ich habe mich schon früher entschuldigt, aber diesmal ist es anders. Zuvor war ich beschämt und von mir selbst abgestoßen – weil ich Euch belogen und wehgetan habe – ich wollte, dass Ihr mich bestraft. Aber jetzt tut es mir leid und macht mich sehr traurig, dass ich all das getan habe."

languages.text: {n}Il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Écoutez... Je suis désolé. Je sais que je me suis déjà excusé, mais cette fois, c'est différent. Avant, j'avais honte, je me dégoûtais moi-même pour vous avoir menti et fait du tort, je voulais que vous me punissiez. Mais à présent, je suis juste navré, et profondément attristé d'en être arrivé là. »
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il se tourne vers vous.{/n} « Écoutez... Je suis désolé. Je sais que je me suis déjà excusé, mais cette fois, c'est différent. Avant, j'avais honte, je me dégoûtais moi-même pour vous avoir menti et fait du tort, je voulais que vous me punissiez. Mais à présent, je suis juste navré, et profondément attristé d'en être arrivé là. »

languages.text: {n}Se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Mire... lo siento. Sé que ya me he disculpado antes, pero esta vez es diferente. Antes sentía vergüenza y asco de mí mismo por mentirle, por hacerle daño... Quería que me castigase por ello. Pero ahora simplemente lamento mucho todo lo que hice».
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Se vuelve hacia ti.{/n} «Mire... lo siento. Sé que ya me he disculpado antes, pero esta vez es diferente. Antes sentía vergüenza y asco de mí mismo por mentirle, por hacerle daño... Quería que me castigase por ello. Pero ahora simplemente lamento mucho todo lo que hice».

languages.text: {n}他转向了你。{/n}“我想说的是……我很抱歉。我知道，我之前也道歉过，但这次不一样。之前那次道歉是因为我厌恶自己，为自己感到羞愧，因为我对你说了谎，伤害了你，我想让你惩罚我。但这次，我真的只是想向你道歉。我做了那些事情，我非常难过。”
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}他转向了你。{/n}“我想说的是……我很抱歉。我知道，我之前也道歉过，但这次不一样。之前那次道歉是因为我厌恶自己，为自己感到羞愧，因为我对你说了谎，伤害了你，我想让你惩罚我。但这次，我真的只是想向你道歉。我做了那些事情，我非常难过。”

languages.text: {n}Sana doğru dönüyor.{/n} "Özür dilerim. Daha önce de dilemiştim fakat bu kez farklı. O vakitler yalan söylediğim, can yaktığım için kendimden iğreniyor ve cezalandırılmak istiyordum. Şimdi ise yalnızca yaptıklarıma üzgünüm."
languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana doğru döner.{/n} "Özür dilerim. Daha önce de dilemiştim lakin bu farklı. O vakitler yalan söylediğim, canınızı yaktığım için kendimden iğreniyor, beni cezalandırmanızı istiyordum. Şimdi ise yalnızca yaptıklarıma üzgünüm."

languages.original_text: {n}He turns to you.{/n} "Look... I'm sorry. I know I've apologised before, but this is different. Before, I felt ashamed and disgusted with myself — for lying to you, for hurting you — I wanted you to punish me. But now I'm just sorry and very sad that I did all that."
